title: Was it Pidens Pod during their speech at the Super Bowl?
subtitle: In a pre-recorded video broadcast before the game, United States President Joe Biden and First Lady Jill Biden thanked front-line health-care workers.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: U.S. President Joe Biden and First Lady Jill Biden were tossed during their pre-recorded statement that was broadcast just before the Super Bowl on February 7, 2021.
